salaryExpectations: LKR 80,000 (Junior UI/UX Designer) to LKR 600,000+ (Lead Product Designer) per month.
futureOutlook: As the tech industry in Sri Lanka matures, there is a growing understanding of the importance of good design. Companies are moving beyond just functionality to focus on user experience, creating high demand for skilled UI/UX professionals. This role is crucial for product-led companies and offers a very promising career path.
